subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets manager Willie Randolph did not wait long this year to move Carlos Delgado, who has had 3 hits in his last 35 at-bats, down in the batting order.
snippet: Mets manager Willie Randolph did not wait long this year to move Carlos Delgado, who has had 3 hits in his last 35 at-bats, down in the batting order.
